question.body: Which of the following is not a function of endothelial cells?

response.feedback: Incorrect. The endothelial cells sense changes in the local mechanical environment and signal to the underlying muscle cells.
Incorrect. The release of cytokines can activate these cells to form pores between cells and to increase their association with immune cells.
Incorrect. Vascular endothelial growth factor can stimulate the endothelial cells to divide.
Correct. Intact endothelial cells prevent clot formation.
